RT @CatrionaRowland: It was wonderful catching up with our own royal Queen 👸🏻 & so delighted she starts her nurse 👩‍⚕️ training next March…
I’m looking forward to speaking at this event about the work we did with @KingsSomaliland and @DrDahir about supporting the regulation of health care in #Somaliland https://t.co/xujx8Guy0I
I have great faith in @DrDahir and her passion for empowering women and leading change. Great work Mariam 🙌🏻 #antiFGM https://t.co/uiOQBOYp38

Praying together before school this morning 🙏🏻 ❤️ and blessing each other with health, knowledge and happiness
God bless the children from the Hope Centre orphanage in #CapeCoast #Ghana https://t.co/PBFhYgiBg0

Some of our beautiful children at the Hope Centre orphanage in #Ghana ❤️❤️❤️
I’ve been coming here for 7 years & watched our babies grow to toddlers, then healthy strong seven year olds
This amazing home works miracles https://t.co/AlbkWxispV

Massive respect to the wonderful Aunties who care for the children 24/7 ❤️❤️❤️ Patient, kind, loving… and very strict!
The children are all very respectful & well disciplined… one call and the children respond “yes Aunty” and leave whatever they are doing to respond 👍🏻

We’ve been at the orphanage for 2 days now, it’s been 48 hours of love, laughter, shouting, tears, cuddles & fun ❤️ The 27 children here are safe & secure, loved, very well-fed & all go to school
Good education is imperative for their future in a tough world #Ghana #Africa
@jtmens Medase 😎

@AbdiSanati Banku & tilapia today... will make sure I get waakye when I’m back in Accra 😋

@Edmund_Koboah Thanks Edmund, we’re having a wonderful time ❤️

@TimMcKenna5 This is a fight you can win @TimMcKenna5 You may feel weak & lost now, but step by step & day by day you’ll improve ➡️Setting small & easy goals for each day really helped me ✅Have a shower ✅Get dressed ✅walk to Costa ✅text 2 friends Keep hope & focus on your #recovery xx
